title: PREMIUM-Episode 41: Pat Churchland on the Neurobiology of Morality (Plus Humeâ€™s Ethics)
description: Patricia Churchland on her new book Braintrust: What Neuroscience Tells Us About Morality. We also discussed David Hume's ethics as foundational to her work, reading his Treatise on Human Nature (1739), Book III, Part I and his Enquiry Concerning the Principles of Morals (1751), Section V, Parts I and II.
